hike-mount-nittany.name: Hike Mount Nittany
hike-mount-nittany.desc: A classic, must-do hike for Penn Staters and visitors! The trailhead is in Lemont, PA, and the hike offers stunning views of Penn State campus and the valley from several overlooks, especially the Mike Lynch Overlook. Moderate to strenuous climb, well-marked paths.

penn-state-arboretum.name: Penn State Arboretum
penn-state-arboretum.desc: A beautiful, 370-acre garden and natural area open daily from dawn to dusk. Features the H.O. Smith Botanic Gardens, children's garden, pollinator and bird garden, walking trails, and seasonal events.

happy-valley-mini-golf.name: Happy Valley Mini Golf
happy-valley-mini-golf.desc: 18-hole course just 3 miles from Penn State. Fun for all ages! Group discounts available.

palmer-museum-of-art.name: Palmer Museum of Art
palmer-museum-of-art.desc: The largest art museum collection between Pittsburgh and Philadelphia, with world-class exhibitions and a diverse permanent collection. Free admission.

connections-clothing.name: Connections Clothing
connections-clothing.desc: A women's boutique in downtown State College, open since 1996. Handpicked, trendy pieces from brands like Free People, Just Black Denim, and Boys Lie.

bagel-love-cafe.name: Bagel Love Cafe
bagel-love-cafe.desc: Fresh bagels, breakfast sandwiches, and coffee in a cozy spot.

wegmans.name: Wegmans
wegmans.desc: Gourmet grocery store with a great prepared foods section.

barrel-21.name: Barrel 21
barrel-21.desc: Distillery and restaurant with creative cocktails and local fare.

tavern.name: Tavern
tavern.desc: Classic American restaurant, a State College staple.

champs-north-atherton.name: Champs (North Atherton)
champs-north-atherton.desc: Sports bar with wings, burgers, and a lively atmosphere. Located on North Atherton Street.

champs-downtown.name: Champs (Downtown)
champs-downtown.desc: More of a bar atmosphere with wings, burgers, and drinks. Located in downtown State College.

penn-state-creamery.name: Penn State Creamery
penn-state-creamery.desc: Legendary ice cream made on campus. Try the Peachy Paterno!

meyer-dairy.name: Meyer Dairy
meyer-dairy.desc: Family-run dairy with unique ice cream flavors and fresh milk.

sweet-frog.name: Sweet Frog
sweet-frog.desc: Self-serve frozen yogurt with tons of toppings.

yallah-hot-chicken.name: Yallah Hot Chicken
yallah-hot-chicken.desc: Spicy fried chicken sandwiches and loaded fries.

lupitas.name: Lupitas
lupitas.desc: Authentic Mexican food, tacos, and more.

duck-donuts.name: Duck Donuts
duck-donuts.desc: Warm, made-to-order donuts with custom toppings.

local-whiskey.name: Local Whiskey
local-whiskey.desc: Bar with a huge whiskey selection and upscale pub food.

central-reservation.name: Central Reservation
central-reservation.desc: Trendy spot for cocktails and small plates.

allen-street-grill.name: Allen Street Grill
allen-street-grill.desc: Upscale American dining with a view of downtown.

corner-room.name: Corner Room
corner-room.desc: Historic eatery serving classic American comfort food.

doggies.name: Doggies
doggies.desc: Bar with hot dogs, fries, and late-night eats.

waffle-shop.name: The Waffle Shop
waffle-shop.desc: Family-owned diner known for homemade breakfast favorites like Strawberry Waffles and Chocolate Chip Pancakes, plus a classic lunch menu. Open 7 AM - 2 PM daily.

pump-station.name: Pump Station
pump-station.desc: Brewpub with craft beers and hearty food.

rothrock-coffee.name: Rothrock Coffee
rothrock-coffee.desc: Specialty coffee shop with pastries and a chill vibe.

happy-valley-brewing.name: Happy Valley Brewing
happy-valley-brewing.desc: Local brewery with creative beers and pub food.

814-cider.name: 814 Cider
814-cider.desc: Cider bar with a variety of local ciders.

pickles.name: Bill Pickle's Tap Room
pickles.desc: Lively bar offering BBQ, craft cocktails, and a wide selection of whiskey, bourbon, and scotch. Known for Country Night on Tuesdays.

buffalo-wild-wings.name: Buffalo Wild Wings
buffalo-wild-wings.desc: Sports bar chain known for Buffalo-style chicken wings, burgers, and a variety of beers. Features numerous TVs for sports viewing.

boal-city-brewing.name: Boal City Brewing
boal-city-brewing.desc: Local brewery offering craft beers brewed on-site. Features a cozy taproom with indoor and outdoor seating.

phyrst.name: The Phyrst
phyrst.desc: Iconic basement bar known for live music, especially the Phyrst Phamily band, and its green beer tradition. Popular with students and locals.

primanti-bros.name: Primanti Bros
primanti-bros.desc: Bar and restaurant famous for Pittsburgh-style sandwiches topped with coleslaw and fries. Full bar with casual dining.
